tabletype_01BH1I78XLS4H6i1fPKHrb0gfnnMFs.description:
Collection Filter.

Input as attribute,operator, value triples

If you want "and" input just the attribute name, ie" name"
if you want "or" input the or with the attribute name and a space. ie "or name"
Supported operators are =, !=, < , <=, >=, and >

You can search with strings in values and wildcards of % are supported by API.
Input strings with single quotes
Input numbers or boolean with no quotes


See more examples/info at 
http://manageiq.org/docs/reference/latest/api/overview/filtering.html

properties.name: input_query_control_attributes
properties.description:
attributes to control the return values.

Possible attributes:

offset
limit
attributes
expand
sort_by
sort_order
sort_options


NOTE: Filter[] is separate in the collectionFilter input
NOTE: If you want multiple of one field, just make it a comma separated list... ie:

ipaddresses,lans,storage

properties.name: input_complete_query
properties.description: pass in complete query string if you know it already

properties.script:
import sys
input_string = sys.argv[1]
sub_string = input_string[1:]
